data.title: Hire Keynote and Guest Speaker
data.meta_description:
Australia's leading voice cartoonist and impressionist, Keith Scott, makes multiple personalities his living.  
Keith’s political impressions ha...
data.text:
Keith was excellent. His manner was professional and reliable. He was funny and kept the crowd absorbed with his remarks. He also helped to control the night in a timely manner.

Commonwealth Bank of Australia

Keith was absolutely brilliant! We have never laughed so much for a long time.

Agility

Keith was very entertaining, personable and professional. A great time was had by all.

Progress Software

WOW. What a presenter / MC!! Keith ensured our night was a success with his professional manner as MC and his comedy presentations through the night. Everyone enjoyed his act and we are still receiving positive feedback from the night with most people indicating that they hadn’t laughed so much or had such a good night out for years. No hesitation in recommending or using Keith again.

Tiffen & Co

Definitely worth an encore performance at some stage. Highlight of the dinner – probably the highlight of the conference seminar.

Australian Credit Union Industry

Keith was very approachable and easy to get along with before the performance. His energy and enthusiasm during his performance were contagious and he got the crowd going and had them in stitches. He didn't want to get off the stage he was on such a roll!

NT Cattlemen’s Association

Although we were running well ahead of time, Keith did a fantastic show even though he was a little rushed. Brilliant!! Thoroughly entertaining and topical. Great performer.

Central Coast Soccer Association

Keith was fantastic entertainment for our annual staff party. There wasn’t a dry eye in the house as everyone had tears of laughter rolling down their faces. Highly recommended.

Greater Building Society Limited

Keith was an absolute hit …. Comments from the crowd were that this was the best presentation night they had been to. It is just a shame that he is so unique that we can’t have him back every year! He had to work around some difficult props (a banquet table) but was a thorough professional.

Macquarie Soccer Association

The entertainer, Keith Scott, was absolutely brilliant. The feedback from our guests was extremely positive and he targeted the audience perfectly (we had a mixed range of ages and there was something for everyone). Keith rang the week prior to the event to finalise any details and everything went smoothly on the night. He was also very accommodating in terms of being involved in the presentation of some awards on the night.

Australian Stainless Steel

Keith is a genius and a rare talent. An inspirational hidden star. He was a huge hit at our function and appealed to team members of all ages. A fantastic night!!

Boyce Chartered Accountants

Keith is to be complimented on his wonderful presentations. His performance drew many accolades from our guests.

Insulflex

Keith was punctual and looked very presentable. He immediately went into his role as MC which he did admirably. His comedy show was brilliant and entertaining.

Cure For Life Foundation

It was a fantastic night. Everyone is talking about it. Keith was a hit a great MC and a lovely man to talk to. I am so glad we took up your recommendation for him. The roulette table was also well enjoyed and as you can imagine, it became the men’s club while the wives boogied their booties off on the dance floor. Thank you for all you did to help make our event a success.

Pacific Medical Imaging

Knocked them out … Fantastic …. They are still talking about him.

Canberra Convention Bureau

Keith had to follow a very entertaining act in the Three Waiters. It would not have been easy for him but his professionalism showed through and he kept the crowd interested and highly amused.

Carbine Club of Port Moresby

Keith is a consummate performer and professional MC. Keith is very personable and put our guests of 240 local and intrastate business people at ease within the first few minutes. His mastery of impersonation and his ability to weave everyday topical events and people into his routine was an absolute hit with everyone. We would highly recommend Keith to anyone looking for that special touch with personality to boot who can carry off your event with ease.

AgriPlex Group

Keith Scott was a major hit at our fundraising dinner. He was the perfect entertainment for our room of CEO’s – his subtle humour was delivered perfectly and all in the room laughed so much. Keith undertook two encores and he could have kept talking all night. We will certainly use Keith again and we have no hesitation in recommending him to this calibre of guest.

Cerebral Palsy Alliance

Keith was great. Very professional and easy to work with, Keith read the audience well and had their utmost attention. 10/10!!

Canberra Business Council

Our guests had the opportunity to select from a “menu” of Acts for the after dinner entertainment they preferred, and the selected act would then perform a private routine at their dinner table. The concept of individual entertainment was a confronting style for entertainers & audience alike! For Keith it was a matter of engaging guests in bizarre conversations with US & Australian politicians. The guests were engrossed in what he was saying, laughing and thoroughly enjoying the experience.

CMA Events

Keith was so warm and friendly to our guests….. nothing was too much trouble. He was a pure professional and gentleman.

Mid Coast Broadcasters
